attributes.action: Restrict engine size for new drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that when a new driver passes there driving test for a motor car that they are restricted to a 1Ltr engine for the two year probationary period.
This will stop young drivers passing their driving tests and then going straight out and obtaining high powered cars that they don’t have the experience to drive, so reducing road injury / Death.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
